name: The Platform Is a Liar
description:
A  2D puzzle platformer where platforms sometimes do the opposite of what they're supposed to. Are they even real?

This game was made in one week for the community game jam. The theme was "The Game Is a Liar." 

Congratulations to everyone who participated in this jam and made a game and thank you all for taking the time to play mine!

Platforms fall on contact, Power Ups sometimes power you down.  What else?

Controls:

Movement - A and D or the Left and Right arrows

Jumping - W, Spacebar, or the Up arrow

Software Used:

Unity

Krita (for art)

I hope you can play till the end of the game (usually takes only between around 5 and 20 mins)

If you enjoyed my game please be sure to rate it and leave a comment and maybe even share it with your friends.
